markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clinch Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=3398) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 127</row>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3394)

**Trigger**
A creature you had [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) successfully [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79).

</column>

---

Your opponents can't slip your grasp without receiving further punishment. Make an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) melee Strike against the triggering creature.
name: Clinch Strike
